root.name: Tecmo Super NBA Basketball
root.description: Tecmo Super NBA Basketball is a 5-on-5 basketball game, published by Tecmo and developed by Acclaim for the SNES and Sega Genesis. The game includes a season mode, with three season lengths (Short, Reduced, and Regular), as well as the option to play a pre-season game and an all-star game. The game includes a battery, allowing the player to save his or her game. Rosters The following are the teams in the game and their rosters. Atlanta Hawks Starters Guards: Rumeal Robinson, Stacey Augmon Forwards: Dominique Wilkins, Kevin Willis Center: Blair Rasmussen Reserves Guards: Morlon Wiley, Rodney Monroe, Maurice Cheeks Forwards: Duane Ferrell, Paul Graham, Alexander Volkov Center: John Koncak Boston Celtics Starters Guards: John Bagley, Dee Brown Forwards: Reggie Lewis, Larry Bird Center: Robert Parish Reserves Guards: Rickey Green, Kevin Gamble Forwards: Rick Fox, Kevin Mchale, Ed Pinckney Center: Joe Kleine, Stojko Vrrankovic Charlotte Hornets Starters Guards: Tyrone (Muggsy) Bogues, Rex Chapman Forwards: Kenny Gattison, Larry Johnson Center: Mike Gminski Reserves Guards: Kevin Lynch, Kendall Gill, Dell Curry Forwards: Anthony Frederick, Johnny Newman, J.R. Reid Center: Eric Leckner Chicago Bulls Starters Guards: John Paxson, Michael Jordan Forwards: Scottie Pippen, Horace Grant Center: Bill Cartwright Reserves Guards: B.J. Armstrong, Bobby Hansen, Craig Hodges Forwards: Stacey King, Cliff Levingston Center: Scott Williams, Will Perdue Cleveland Cavaliers Starters Guards: Mark Price, Craig Ehlo Forwards: John (Hot Rod) Williams, Larry Nance Center: Brad Daugherty Reserves Guards: Terrell Brandon, John Battle, Steve Kerr, Jimmy Oliver Forwards: Winston Bennett, Henry James Center: Danny Ferry Dallas Mavericks
